Description: The resource returns one or more reasons for visit associated with a patient encounter. This data includes audit and tracking information about when a reason for visit is relevant and who noted it.
SampleResponse:
<condition xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="egFptNetytmse51RiokqI2Z3QBHsNx8GHXDYi7EhR.f9fR-tfX6ms3qkivkLc2Bd13"></id>

<category>

<coding>

<system value="http://open.epic.com/FHIR/StructureDefinition/condition-category"></system>

<code value="reason-for-visit"></code>

<display value="Reason for Visit"></display>

</coding>

<text value="Reason for Visit"></text>

</category>

<code>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.5325.1.7.2.728286"></system>

<code value="43294"></code>

<display value="Rash"></display>

</coding>

<text value="Rash"></text>

</code>

<bodysite>

<coding>

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.5325.1.7.2.866976"></system>

<code value="11347"></code>

<display value="Right Leg"></display>

</coding>

<text value="Right Leg"></text>

</bodysite>

<subject>

<reference value="Patient/e56rHiD8cHF60CyLEUJ-1Ew3"></reference>

<display value="Shepherd, Amelia"></display>

</subject>

<encounter>

<reference value="Encounter/eeM8KWAwqj5oZbB7ROBexzAvNiJBO0VmJdfkt2kHvJ.s3"></reference>

</encounter>

<recordeddate value="2021-07-28T17:03:39Z"></recordeddate>

<recorder>

<reference value="Practitioner/ehchKMZoNW8B.Ycy.dUrFtg3"></reference>

<display value="Eva Ward, MD"></display>

</recorder>

<note>

<text value="This is my comment."></text>

</note>

</condition>

ID.Name: ID
ID.Description: FHIR identifier for the target Condition resource.

Condition.Name: Condition
Condition.Description: An instance of the R4 Condition resource.

code.Name: code
code.Description: External codings for the condition. If a list of codes is sent, they're listed in this element.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description: The encounter associated with the condition

recordedDate.Name: recordedDate
recordedDate.Description: The date the condition was recorded.

recorder.Name: recorder
recorder.Description: The provider associated with recording the condition

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: The patient associated with the condition
